snippet: Detroit’s City Council voted on Wednesday to challenge state plans to assign an outside emergency manager to shore up the city’s troubled finances.
abstract: Detroit’s City Council votes to challenge Michigan plans to assign outside emergency manager to shore up city’s troubled finances, even as Mayor Dave Bing says he will take no part in challenge.
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s City Council voted on Wednesday to challenge state plans to assign an outside emergency manager to shore up the city’s troubled finances.

headline.main: Michigan: Detroit Council Resists State Plan for Emergency Manager
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Detroit Council Resists State Plan For Emergency Manager
